tool_description:
Cheapest, affordable and accurate geocoding API. Powered by Google Maps, it eliminates the need for unreliable open-source databases like Nominatim. Get precise results, save costs, and easily integrate our user-friendly API into your applications. Experience the power of reliable geocoding with us today.

Keywords : geocode, geocoding, forward geocoding, reverse geocoding, google maps, coordinates, address
name: Google Maps Geocoding
title: Google Maps Geocoding

api_list.name: Geocoding

required_parameters.name: address
required_parameters.description: The street address that you want to geocode, in the format used by the national postal service of the country concerned. Additional address elements such as business names and unit, suite or floor numbers should be avoided.
required_parameters.default: 1406 E Bell Ave, Anaheim, CA 92805, USA

api_list.name: Reverse Geocoding

required_parameters.name: lat
required_parameters.description: The latitude value specifying the location for which you wish to obtain the closest, human-readable address.

required_parameters.name: long
required_parameters.description: The longitude value specifying the location for which you wish to obtain the closest, human-readable address.
